testcase.name: Create a new article | hardcoded values
testcase.system-out: Given url 'https://conduit.productionready.io/api/' ....................... passed * def tokenResponse = callonce read('classpath:src/test/java/helpers/CreateToken.feature') { "email": "karate@user.com", "password": "karate123"} . passed * def token = tokenResponse.authToken ..................................... passed * def articleRequestBody = read('classpath:src/test/java/conduitApp/json/newArticleRequest.json') . passed * def dataGenerator = Java.type('helpers.DataGenerator') .................. passed * set articleRequestBody.article.title = dataGenerator.getRandomArticlesValues().title . passed * set articleRequestBody.article.description = dataGenerator.getRandomArticlesValues().title . passed * set articleRequestBody.article.title = dataGenerator.getRandomArticlesValues().description . passed * set articleRequestBody.article.body = dataGenerator.getRandomArticlesValues().body . passed Given header Authorization = 'Token ' + token ............................. passed Given path 'articles' ..................................................... passed And request ............................................................... passed When method Post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response.article.title == 'Bla bla' ............................. passed
